Title: The Invisible Boy: Second Generation
Writer: Alessandro Fabbri, Ludovica Rampoldi, Stefano Sardo
Actors: Ludovico Girardello, Kseniya Rappoport, Galatéa Bellugi, Ivan Franek
Plot: Three years later Michele (The Invisible boy) meets his mother and his twin sister. Both have stories and superpowers but their intentions may not be what Michele thinks.
